body_html:
Sorry for long time without an activity. I had some health issues and had to focus on that first.

I think this issue has been solved.
My laptop finally broke and I had to reinstall everything. With my current setup everything runned for about 9 hours using GPU, so I think it is unlikely to return again.
When I was writing this comment I figured out, that I had forgotten to install cuDNN. It was running smoothly without it.

Current setup:

  • OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04): Windows 10
  • TensorFlow installed from (source or binary): binary
  • TensorFlow version (use command below): 1.9.0
  • Python version: 3.6.6
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.2.148/None
  • GPU model and memory: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti GDDR5 4GB

body:
Sorry for long time without an activity. I had some health issues and had to focus on that first.
***
I think this issue has been **solved**.
My laptop finally broke and I had to reinstall everything. With my current setup everything runned for about 9 hours using GPU, so I think it is unlikely to return again.
When I was writing this comment I figured out, that I had forgotten to install cuDNN. It was running smoothly without it.

Current setup:

- OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04): Windows 10
- TensorFlow installed from (source or binary): binary
- TensorFlow version (use command below): 1.9.0
- Python version: 3.6.6
- CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.2.148/None
- GPU model and memory: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti GDDR5 4GB
